full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/15/2023 10 Rs. WG REGISTR 3.0 O and USS POE. 10RS Â© TEN RUPEES Signing BIRTH AFFIDAVIT I, CHITARAMBHAI VANMALIBHAI PATEL, aged about 87 years, resident of BAJIPURA, TAL : VALOD, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT STATE, INDIA, do hereby solemnly declare on oath as Under:- We have applied for obtaining the Birth Certificate for GANGABEN D/O NATHUBHAI RANCHHODBHAI PATEL, from Mamlatdar Office, VALOD, DIST: SURAT, INDIA, bu't her birth record is not registered in the Government Record in the year of 1907, recived answer, and hence made this affidavit. GANGABEN D/O NATHUBHAI RANCHHODBHAI PATEL, was born at QC Village BAJIPURA, TAL: VALOD, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT STATE, INDIA, on 4-9-1907. Her father's name is:- NATHUBHAI RANCHHODBHAI PATEL. Her mother's name is:- BHULIBEN NATHUBHAI PATEL. I am in the same village of the above mention party so I know the above facts very well. What is stated above is true to the best of my knowledge and belief. T I know that to make a false affidavit is a criminal offence. IDENTIFIED BY:- SIGNATURE:- Solemnly affirmed and signed before me by Shri Chitarambhai Vanmalibhai Patel, of Bajipura, Tal: Valod? Dist: Surat, Gujara State, India, who is identified to me by Shri M.N.Vyas, of Bardoli, Dist: Surat? India, whom I know personally to him.
